item.title: Version 1.0.0-beta
item.description:
EllProxy v1.0.0-beta

First public beta release of EllProxy!

Features:

  • Native macOS menu bar app for AI proxy management
  • OAuth integration with Claude, Codex, Gemini, Qwen, Antigravity, Copilot, iFlow, Kiro
  • Multi-account support with automatic failover
  • ThinkingProxy for extended thinking support
  • Quick Setup for OpenCode, Claude Code, and Trae IDE
  • Automatic app updates via Sparkle

Notes:

This is a beta release. Please report any issues on GitHub.
